Absorb.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Bide.description: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

Bind.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Clamp.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Constrict.description: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

Conversion.description: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

Counter.description: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

Dig.description: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

Disable.description: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

Dream Eater.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

Earthquake.description: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

Fire Spin.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Fly.description: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Growth.description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

Gust.description: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

High Jump Kick.description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

Jump Kick.description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

Leech Life.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Leech Seed.description: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

Light Screen.description: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

Low Kick.description: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

Mega Drain.description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Metronome.description: User performs almost any move in the game at random.

Mirror Move.description: User performs the opponent's last move.

Mist.description: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

Night Shade.description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Pay Day.description: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

Petal Dance.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Razor Wind.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

Recover.description: User recovers half its max HP.

Reflect.description: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

Rest.description: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

Roar.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Seismic Toss.description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Skull Bash.description: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

Sky Attack.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching. High critical hit ratio.

Soft-Boiled.description: User recovers half its max HP.

Solar Beam.description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

Struggle.description: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

Substitute.description: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

Super Fang.description: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

Teleport.description: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

Thrash.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Transform.description: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

Tri Attack.description: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

Twineedle.description: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

Whirlwind.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Wrap.description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.
